string.text: The Agroprom underground contains a stash belonging to a group of stalkers which reached the center of the Zone. The stalkers used the stash to exchange information. You must find the stash and the PDA with communications
Emergency water dump activated. The lower levels will be flooded. Leave the flooded area

There is an old pumping station used to pump ground water in the underground. You must find the control panel for the pumping station and dump water out of the reservoirs. This will flood the underground
Destroy the mutants that are physically pressuring objects, blocking the passage way to the pump station control room.
